Title: Provides for a tax credit for certain persons relocating to the state to provide or receive reproductive care or gender-affirming care
Summary: Provides for a tax credit for certain persons relocating to the state to provide or receive reproductive care or gender-affirming care.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a personal income tax credit for certain persons relocating to the state to provide or receive reproductive care or gender-affirming care
